name: Twinblade Salamandra
text: This card’s name is "Salamandra" while it is face-up on the field or in the GY. Equip only to a FIRE monster. It gains 700 ATK. You can banish this card from the GY; add 1 "Flame Sword" monster from your GY to your hand. A "Flame Swordsman" card equipped with this card gains the following effect: Once per turn (Quick Effect): when a Spell/Trap card or a monster effect is activated, add 1 "Salamandra" card from your Deck to your hand; negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card.
